props.name: disabled
props.description:
A disabled button/link will have no pointer events and
the opacity is be reduced.

props.name: download
props.description: Whether the link should be downloaded directly

props.name: rel
props.description: `rel` attribute for the link

props.name: tabindex
props.description:
Custom tabindex; only use if you really know
how to adjust the order properly

props.name: target
props.description: Set the target of the link

props.name: title
props.description:
The title attribute can be used to add additional text
to the button/link, which is shown on mouseover.

props.name: autofocus
props.description: Sets autofocus on button (when supported by element)

props.name: click
props.description: Pass instead of a link URL to be triggered on clicking the button

props.name: current
props.description:
Sets the `aria-current` attribute.
Especially useful in connection with the `link` attribute.

props.name: dialog
props.description: Name/path of a dialog to open on click

props.name: drawer
props.description: Name/path of a drawer to open on click

props.name: dropdown
props.description: Whether the button opens a dropdown

props.name: element
props.description: Force which HTML element to use

props.name: icon
props.description: Adds an icon to the button.

props.name: id
props.description: A unique id for the HTML element

props.name: link
props.description:
If the link attribute is set, the button will be represented
as a proper `a` tag with `link`'s value as `href` attribute.

props.name: responsive
props.description:
A responsive button will hide the button text on smaller screens
automatically and only keep the icon. An icon must be set in this case.
If set to `text`, the icon will be hidden instead.

props.name: role
props.description: `role` attribute for the button

props.name: selected
props.description: Sets the `aria-selected` attribute.

props.name: size
props.description: Specific sizes for button styling

props.name: text
props.description: The button text

props.name: theme
props.description: With the theme you can control the general design of the button.

props.name: type
props.description: The type attribute sets the button type like in HTML.

props.name: variant
props.description: Styling variants for the button

slots.name: default
slots.description: The Button text. You can also use the `text` prop. Leave empty for icon buttons.
